level.heading: SCOPE OF PRACTICE OF REGISTERED RECREATION THERAPIST OR CERTIFIED THERAPEUTICECREATION (ยง 17-7203)

level.text: An individual registered under this chapter as a recreation therapist may engage in the “practice of recreation therapy” as defined herein.

As used in this chapter, the practice of “recreation therapy” means the use of the title Recreation Therapist by persons who meet the education and training requirements of ยง 7202(2); or the use of the title Certified Therapeutic Recreation Specialist by persons who meet the education and training requirements of ยง 7202(1). All persons registered pursuant to the act and these rules are entitled to use the title Recreation Therapist.
The practice of recreation therapy shall include the following:
All direct patient or client services of assessment;

Education for either individuals or groups that require specific therapeutic recreation or recreation therapy intervention with such services being provided for recreation resources and opportunities to improve health and well being.
